text: (ema aparadhakarayin nam, tamange pana atpat kara gænima sandaha) ovun veta malayikavarun pæminima ho nætahot obage deviyange niyogayata anuva (danduvam) pæminima ho misa, (vena kisivak) ovun balaporottu vannehuda? movunta pera vasaya kala ayada mesema (aparadha) karamin sitiyaha. allah movunta kisiyam haniyak kale næta. ehet ovun tamanta tamanma aparadha kara gatha
